description: Adds the specified tags to the contact resource. For more information about this API is used, see Set up granular billing for a detailed view of your Amazon Connect usage.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: The identifier of the contact in this instance of Amazon Connect.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be assigned to the contact resource. For example, { 'Tags': {'key1':'value1', 'key2':'value2'} }. (string) --- (string) ---
